entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
